pageData.pageDescription: Kate Spade New York® – See and shop our new collection. Discover bags, jewelry and dresses in spades. Free shipping and returns to all 50 states.

en-US.prechatCaptureGreetingText: Hey there! Thanks for getting in touch. Our stylists are available Monday through Friday from 11AM–9PM EST. What’s your name?
en-US.prechatCaptureConfirmationText: Great to meet you! We will connect you with an in-store stylist now. You can also switch to texting at any time by selecting SMS from the menu. Standard messaging fees apply.
en-US.awayModeMessageAssigned: Hey {customerName}, I’m looking into your request and will get back to you in a few minutes. If you’d rather not wait, just leave your phone number so I can get back to you. Thanks for getting in touch! If you would like to end this conversation at any point, type '0'
en-US.awayModeMessagePooled: Thanks for waiting {customerName}, our in-store stylists aren’t available right now. Please leave us a message and click below to add your phone number so a stylist can get back to you.
en-US.clickToRetry: Message not delivered. Click to retry.
en-US.clickToRetryForm: Form not submitted. Click anywhere on the form to retry.
en-US.connectNotificationSingleText: Please click the icon below to continue messaging us through text
en-US.smsBadRequestError: We were unable to communicate with this number. Try again or use a different one.
en-US.smsInvalidNumberError: Your phone number isn't valid. Please try again.
en-US.smsPingChannelError: There was an error sending a message to your number.
en-US.smsTooManyRequestsError: A connection for that number was requested recently. Please try again in

header-banner-m.styles: .promo-tile-up-2 .at-media-asset { height: 300px; } .promo-tile-up-2 .at-media-asset { max-height: 18.8rem; } .header-promo-banner, .header-promo-banner .header-banner { background-color: black; } .header-promo-banner a { color: white; text-transform: uppercase; } .brand-kate-spade .header-promo-banner { padding: 0.6rem 0rem; } .brand-kate-spade #product-search-results .tarNode picture img{ object-fit: contain; } @media (min-width:769px) { #product-search-results .product-tile.tarNode { grid-column: unset; } .header-promo-banner { padding: 1.2rem 0rem; } .brand-kate-spade .header-promo-banner { padding: 1.2rem 0rem; } .brand-kate-spade #__next header>div:nth-of-type(3) { min-height: unset !important; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 1600px) { .promo-tile-up-2 .at-media-asset { max-height: 22vw; } } @media (min-width:992px) { .brand-kate-spade #footer>div>div:nth-of-type(2) a { margin-right: 0.9rem; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 768px) { .promo-tile-up-2 .at-media-asset { max-height: 66vw; height: auto !Important; } .brand-kate-spade #product-search-results .tarNode picture img { height: auto; } }
